column1: The Pit Room////The food here is hardly Texas BBQ. Especially if you are comparing it to Black's in Lockhart or Austin. Their brisket is loaded with fat
column2: and I even asked for "extra lean". Their beef sausage was cold and greasy
column3: and I couldn't even eat a full bite. If you want real good beef sausage in Houston
column4: Luling City Market on Richmond at 610 has great beef sausage. This place is expensive
column5: and the food is not worth what they are changing for it.
